summary.span: 在可捲動方格中顯示 ADO.NET 資料。

span.span: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.

summary.span: 控制項會取代 控制項並加入其他功能，不過您也可以選擇保留 控制項，以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。

span.span: The control replaces and adds functionality to the control; however, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示子資料表的類似網頁連結。The displays Web-like links to child tables. 您可以按一下連結以瀏覽至子資料表。You can click on a link to navigate to the child table. 顯示子資料表時，請返回按鈕會出現在標題，可以按一下瀏覽回到父資料表中。When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table. 從父資料列的資料會顯示在標題下方和上方的資料行標頭。The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers. 您可以按一下右邊的 [上一頁] 按鈕的按鈕隱藏父資料列資訊。You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button. 若要顯示的資料表中在執行階段，使用方法來設定和屬性，以有效的資料來源。To display a table in the at run time, use the method to set the and properties to a valid data source. 下列資料來源是有效的：The following data sources are valid: - A - A - A - A - 單一維度陣列A single dimension array - 實作任何元件介面Any component that implements the interface - 實作任何元件介面Any component that implements the interface 如需詳細資訊類別，請參閱[Dataset、 Datatable 和 Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md)。For more information about the class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md). 您可以建立一個方格，其中可讓使用者編輯資料，但會讓使用者無法使用加入新的資料列做為資料來源並設定屬性設`false`。You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a as the data source and setting the property to `false`. 資料來源會進一步受物件。Data sources are further managed by objects. 每個資料表在資料來源可以從表單的傳回。For each table in a data source, a can be returned from the form's . 例如，您可以判斷藉由傳回相關聯之資料來源所包含的資料列數目物件的屬性。For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated object's property. 若要驗證資料，請使用基礎物件，代表資料和其事件。To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events. 例如，如果資料來自中，使用和事件。For example, if the data comes from a in a , use the and events. > [!NOTE] > 因為您可以自訂的資料行數目 (藉由新增或刪除的成員) 和資料行中，依排序的資料列並屬性值不能保證以對應至和中的索引。Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the ) and the rows can be sorted by column, the and property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to and indexes in a . 因此您應該避免使用這些屬性在事件，以驗證資料。Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the event to validate data. 若要判斷哪一個儲存格已選取，請使用屬性。To determine which cell is selected, use the property. 使用變更任一儲存格的值屬性，這可能需要的儲存格之資料列和資料行的索引，或是單一。Change the value of any cell by using the property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single . 監視事件來偵測當使用者選取另一個資料格。Monitor the event to detect when the user selects another cell. 若要判斷控制項的哪個部分使用者按下，使用方法中的事件。To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the method in the event. 方法會傳回物件，其中包含的資料列和按下區域的資料行。The method returns a object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area. 若要管理控制項外觀，在執行階段，設定色彩和標題屬性的數個屬性已推出，包括， ， ，依此類推。To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the , , , and so on. 顯示格線 （或方格） 的外觀可以藉由建立進一步修改物件，並將它們加入至，這透過存取屬性。The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating objects and adding them to the , which is accessed through the property. 例如，如果設定為包含三個物件，您可以新增三個物件加入集合，每個資料表的一個。For example, if the is set to a containing three objects, you can add three objects to the collection, one for each table. 若要同步處理每個物件，將的來的。To synchronize each object with a , set the of the to the of the . 物件的繫結至陣列的相關資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the property. 若要建立自訂的檢視的資料表，建立的執行個體或是類別，並將物件加入至經由屬性。To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a or class and add the object to the accessed through the property. 這兩個類別都是繼承自 。Both classes inherit from . 每個資料行樣式，設定至您想要顯示在方格中的資料行。For each column style, set the to the of a column that you want to show in the grid. 若要隱藏資料行，將其以外的有效。To hide a column, set its to something other than a valid . 若要格式化的文字資料行，設定的屬性中找到之值的其中一個[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。To format the text of a column, set the property of the to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 若要繫結到物件的強型別陣列中的物件型別必須包含公用屬性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要建立會顯示陣列，設定屬性設`typename[]`其中`typename`以物件類型的名稱取代。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 也請注意，屬性會區分大小寫; 必須完全符合的型別名稱。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 請參閱範例中的屬性。See the property for an example. 您也可以繫結至。You can also bind the to an . 一項功能是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但只能繫結至這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 這表示，所有的物件必須是相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自清單中的第一個項目相同的類別。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目，第二個項目可能(繼承自)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 如果，相反地，第一個項目是，第二個物件不可以是。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，它繫結時，必須有項目中。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 空白會導致空的方格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 此外，在物件必須包含公用屬性。In addition, the objects in the must contain public properties. 當繫結至，將的於"ArrayList"（類型名稱）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). 每個中，您可以設定色彩和標題屬性 (attribute) 的設定會覆寫控制項。For each , you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the control. 不過，如果未設定這些屬性，預設會使用控制項的設定。However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default. 下列屬性可以覆寫屬性：The following properties can be overridden by properties: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要自訂個別資料行的外觀，請新增物件至，這透過存取每個屬性。To customize the appearance of individual columns, add objects to the , which is accessed through the property of each . 同步處理每個具有中，將來的。To synchronize each with a in the , set the to the of a . 在建構時，您也可以設定格式化的字串，指定資料行顯示資料的方式。When constructing a , you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data. 例如，您可以指定資料行，使用簡短日期格式顯示資料表中包含的日期。For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 一律會建立物件，並將其新增至之前新增物件至。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 當您將加入空的有效值加入集合中，自動為您產生的物件。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，將會擲回例外狀況如果您嘗試加入新物件具有重複值來。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . > [!NOTE] > 控制項會取代 控制項並加入其他功能，不過您也可以選擇保留 控制項，以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。The control replaces and adds functionality to the control; however, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Forms DataGridView 和 DataGrid 控制項之間的差異](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立 Windows 表單包含兩個物件，和與相關的兩個資料表。The following code example creates a Windows form, a containing two objects, and a that relates the two tables. 若要顯示的資料，控制項再繫結至透過方法。To display the data, a control is then bound to the through the method. 在表單上的按鈕變更格線的外觀，藉由建立兩個物件和設定每個物件其中的物件。A button on the form changes the appearance of the grid by creating two objects and setting the of each object to a of one of the objects. 此範例也包含中的程式碼所使用的事件列印資料行、 資料列，以及已按下為格線一部分的方法。The example also contains code in the event that uses the method to print the column, row, and part of the grid that has been clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會覆寫屬性，如果沒有目前控制項的作用中。This property is overridden by the property if there is a currently in effect for the control. 如果允許排序，則按一下資料行標頭會排序依據該資料行的資料表資料。If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column. 您可以也使用排序的運算式。You can also sort using an expression for a . 請參閱如需有關建立排序運算式。See for details on creating a sort expression. 如果繫結至，您可以設定資料表使用的自訂排序類別的屬性。If the is bound to a , you can set a custom sort for the table using the class's property. 同樣地，如果繫結至，在每個資料表可以藉由設定有自訂排序類別的屬性。Similarly, if the is bound to a , each table in the can have a custom sort by setting the class's property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例切換屬性。The following code example toggles the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含多個來源的資料，您應該設定至其中一個來源。If a contains multiple sources of data, you should set the to one of the sources. 比方說，如果是或是，其中包含三個資料表都叫做`Customers`， `Orders`，和`OrderDetails`，您必須指定其中一個繫結至資料表。For example, if the is a or that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to. 如果或是只會包含一個，您應該設定來的。If the or contains only one , you should set the to the of that . 如果設定為包含物件時，父資料表會出現加號 （+） 中每個資料列行首。If the is set to a that contains objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header. 按一下加號會導致出現，其中包含連結到子資料表的節點。Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables. 比方說，如果包含兩個命名的物件`Customers`並`Orders`，設定來`Customers`資料表原因顯示每個資料列的父資料表有顯示加號標頭。For example, if a contains two objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the to the `Customers` table causes the to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header. 如果設為`Orders`，不過，在資料列標頭會是空白。If the is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank. 如果已， ，集合或陣列，設定屬性會擲回的例外狀況。If the is a , , collection, or array, setting the property throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 在執行階段，您必須使用方法來重設屬性。At run time, you must use the method to reset the property. 不過，可以重設單獨的屬性，以有效的資料表名稱。However, the property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定並屬性的控制項。The following code example sets the and properties of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，使用方法來設定和屬性。At run time, use the method to set the and properties. 下列資料來源是有效的：The following data sources are valid: - A - A - A - A - 實作任何元件介面Any component that implements the interface - 實作任何元件介面Any component that implements the interface 請參閱類別概觀，如需有關資料來源。See the class overview for more information on data sources. 如果參考都包含一個以上的資料表，您必須設定屬性，指定要繫結至資料表的字串。If the reference contains more than one table, you must set the property a string that specifies the table to bind to. 比方說，如果是或是，其中包含三個資料表都叫做`Customers`， `Orders`，和`OrderDetails`，您必須指定要繫結至資料表。For example, if the is a or that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to. 設定未實作的物件介面或會導致擲回例外狀況方格。Setting the to an object that does not implement the interface or an will cause the grid to throw an exception. 您可以建立一個方格，其中可讓使用者編輯資料，但會讓使用者無法使用加入新的資料列做為資料來源並設定屬性設`false`。You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a as the data source and setting the property to `false`. 若要繫結到物件的強型別陣列中的物件型別必須包含公用屬性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要建立會顯示陣列，設定屬性設`typename`其中`typename`以物件類型的名稱取代。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 也請注意，屬性會區分大小寫; 必須完全符合的型別名稱。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 請參閱範例中的屬性。See the property for an example. 您也可以繫結至。You can also bind the to an . 一項功能是，它可以包含物件的多個類型，但只能繫結至這類清單在清單中的所有項目時的第一個項目相同的型別。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 這表示，所有的物件必須是相同的類型，或它們必須繼承自清單中的第一個項目相同的類別。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果在清單中的第一個項目，第二個項目可能(繼承自)。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 如果，相反地，第一個項目是，第二個物件不可以是。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，它繫結時，必須有項目中。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound. 空白會導致空的方格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 此外，在物件必須包含公用屬性。In addition, the objects in the must contain public properties. 當繫結至，將的於"ArrayList"（類型名稱）。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定，並在需要時， ，以繫結同時和。The following code example shows how to set the , and when needed, the , to bind a to both a and a . 此範例也示範如何傳回資料來源從。The example also shows how to return data sources from the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示方格是否在唯讀模式中。

value.span: 如果方格是唯讀模式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the grid is in read-only mode; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在唯讀模式中，您可以捲動方格，可以展開或摺疊節點，依此類推。In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on. 不過，任何新增、 編輯或刪除可能需要的地方。However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place. 也有可以設定為 true，以防止資料正在編輯中，依資料行的資料行的屬性。The also has a property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis. 可以設定為 true，如果您想要禁止使用者編輯資料直接在。The can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the . 比方說，您可能想要讓使用者看到所有的資料行在資料表中，但可讓他們編輯特定欄位只能透過不同表單上的控制項。For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through controls on a different form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例切換屬性。The following code example toggles the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用透過擷取屬性來建立自訂的檢視顯示每個資料表控制項。Use the retrieved through the property to create customized views of each table displayed by the control. 根據預設，傳回集合屬性不包含任何物件。By default, the collection returned by property does not contain any objects. 若要建立一組自訂的檢視：To create a set of customized views: 1. 建立 。Create a . 2. 設定要之格線資料表物件的。Set the of the grid table object to the of the . 3. 新增物件，您想要顯示，請為每一個方格資料行對應到一個所傳回屬性。Add objects, one for each grid column you want to show, to the returned by the property. 4. 設定每個要的。Set the of each to the of a . 5. 新增所傳回的集合物件屬性。Add the object to the collection returned by property. > [!CAUTION] > 一律會建立物件，並將其新增至之前新增物件至。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 當您將加入空的有效值加入集合中，自動為您產生的物件。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，將會擲回例外狀況如果您嘗試加入新物件具有重複值來。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立一個針對每個中找到，並設定的來的。The following code example creates one for each found in a , and sets the of the to the of the . 接著會新增至所傳回屬性。The is then added to the returned by the property. 這個範例也會列印每個中所傳回屬性的每個在。The example also prints the of each in the returned by the property of each in the . span.span: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在執行階段變更顯示的資料列數目，如果使用者可以調整大小控制項。The number of visible rows can be changed at run time if the user is allowed to resize the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回資料列數目顯示在控制項。The following code example returns the number of rows visible in a control.
